Patients receive rituximab IV day 1 ; doxorubicin IV continuously , etoposide IV continuously , vincristine IV continuously day 1-4 ; oral prednisone twice daily day 1-5 ; cyclophosphamide IV day 5 . Patients also receive filgrastim ( G-CSF ) subcutaneously begin day 6 continue blood count recover . Treatment repeat every 21 day 8 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity .
